column1: 0814|fourteen minutes past eight|At fourteen minutes past eight
column3: wearing a sheepskin coat. He was sucking on a hand-rolled cigarette. The man stuck out his hand
column5:
he said. 0814|8:14 A.M.|8:14 A.M.
What happened?" Ramirez asked. Helling had alerted him by walkie-talkie and summoned him to the lobby. There the Germans were returning
column6: Henes Sommer covered with blood and being carried by Rudolph Schindler and Peter Maier.
